item.title: Hello World Blog
item.description:
For years, I have been deeply indebted to the generosity of others who have taken the time to document their technical learnings in one form or another on the Internet. In that spirit I have created this blog, and I hope in time to generate content that creates some value. Eventually, there will be a comment box following each post. Until then, use email if you wish to comment. I am currently working mostly with the Scala programming language.

This is the first time I have managed to set up a blog. The remainder of this post will cover the path taken.
